title: [Oracle SQL] Add PLSQL_BLOCK for PLSQL of Oracle
body: Related issue: https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/27569 In this pr, I added PLSQL_BLOCK for PLSQL of Oracle. I referred to this doc where you can find the detailed definition: https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/21/lnpls/block.html#GUID-9ACEB9ED-567E-4E1A-A16A-B8B35214FC9D Now the following SQL can be parsed: DECLARE warehouse NUMBER := 1; ground NUMBER := 1; insured NUMBER := 1; result NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT BIN_TO_NUM(warehouse, ground, insured) INTO result FROM DUAL; UPDATE orders SET order_status = result WHERE order_id = 2441; END;
